creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
steps to reproduce:
create new empty pub
create a german index document.
now log in as some user, select your new publication.
you will try to access index.html, which does not exist. the import content
heuristics cut in and throw an error "can't import because content already exists".
what should happen instead is that lenya falls through to the non-default language.
Now it checks for the sitetree.
creator: andreas@apache.org
